info.description:
A RESTful API for managing wish lists, gift items, and reservations.
Features include user authentication, wish list management, gift item tracking, and reservation system.
info.title: Wish List API

post.description: Change the authenticated user's email address with password verification. Requires current password to prevent unauthorized changes.

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

post.description: Change the authenticated user's password with current password verification. This will invalidate all existing sessions except the current one.

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

post.description: Exchange a handoff code received from Frontend redirect for access and refresh tokens. Code can only be used once.

400.description: Invalid request body

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

post.description: Clear refresh token cookie and invalidate session
Generate a short-lived (60 second) one-time code for transferring authentication from Frontend to Mobile app.

429.description: Rate limit exceeded (10 requests/minute per user)

post.description: Exchange Facebook authorization code for access and refresh tokens

400.description: Invalid or expired authorization code

post.description: Exchange Google authorization code for access and refresh tokens

400.description: Invalid or expired authorization code

post.description: Exchange refresh token for a new access token. Accepts refresh token via httpOnly cookie (web clients) or Authorization Bearer header (mobile clients). Implements token rotation - returns new refresh token on success.
Create a new user account with email and password

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

409.description: User with this email already exists

get.description: Get all reservations made by a guest using their reservation token.
get.summary: Get reservations made by a guest using a token

200.description: List of guest reservations retrieved successfully

400.description: Invalid request parameters

get.description: Performs a health check of the application and its dependencies (database)

post.description: Upload an image file to S3 storage. The user must be authenticated.

image.description: Image file to upload (max 10MB, only images allowed)

400.description: Invalid file or file too large

get.description: Get all gift items owned by the authenticated user with pagination and filters

parameters.description: Filter items not attached to any wishlist
parameters.name: unattached

parameters.description: Filter items attached to any wishlist
parameters.name: attached

400.description: Invalid query parameters

post.description: Create a new gift item without attaching it to a wishlist

400.description: Invalid request body

get.description: Get a specific gift item by ID

put.description: Update a gift item by ID

400.description: Invalid request body

delete.description: Archive a gift item by setting archived_at timestamp. Item is removed from all queries but data is preserved.

post.description: Mark a gift item as purchased with the actual purchased price. This is a global status.

400.description: Invalid request body

delete.description: Delete the authenticated user's account and all associated data. This action is irreversible.

get.description: Export the authenticated user's data in JSON format for compliance and personal records
Get the authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

get.description: Get the reservation status for a specific gift item in a public wish list.
get.summary: Get the reservation status for a gift item in a public wish list

get.description: Get a public wish list by its public slug. The wish list must be marked as public.
get.summary: Get a public wish list by its slug

get.description: Get all gift items for a public wish list by its public slug with pagination support.
get.summary: Get gift items for a public wish list by slug

404.description: Wish list not found or not public

get.description: Get all reservations made by the authenticated user with pagination.
get.summary: Get all reservations made by the authenticated user

200.description: List of user reservations retrieved successfully

post.description: Create a reservation for a gift item. Can be done by authenticated users or guests (with name and email).
post.summary: Create a reservation for a gift item

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

delete.description: Cancel a reservation for a gift item. Can be done by authenticated users or guests (with reservation token).
delete.summary: Cancel a reservation for a gift item

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

get.description: Get all wish lists owned by the currently authenticated user. Includes item_count for each wishlist.
get.summary: Get all wish lists owned by the authenticated user

200.description: List of wish lists retrieved successfully (includes item_count)

post.description: Create a new wish list for the authenticated user

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

get.description: Get a wish list by its ID. If the wish list is private, the user must be the owner.
get.summary: Get a wish list by ID

put.description: Update a wish list by its ID. The user must be the owner of the wish list.

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

delete.description: Delete a wish list by its ID. The user must be the owner of the wish list.

get.description: Get all gift items in a specific wishlist with pagination. Public wishlists are accessible without auth.

post.description: Attach an existing gift item to a wishlist. Both item and wishlist must be owned by the authenticated user.

400.description: Invalid request body

post.description: Create a new gift item and immediately attach it to the specified wishlist

400.description: Invalid request body

delete.description: Remove a gift item from a wishlist. The item itself is not deleted, only the association is removed.

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization

refreshToken.description: Refresh token (long-lived, 7 days) - also set as httpOnly cookie
